parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_employmentdetails">
    <attribute name="leidos_employmentdetailsid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_employmentrole" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentaccountmanagementclientplan" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_accountmanagementclientplanid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_clientplansummary">
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_clientplansummaryid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentclientplan" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_accountmanagementclientplanid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_tradinggeography">
    <attribute name="leidos_percentageofsales" />
    <attribute name="leidos_tradinggeographyid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_geography" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentclientplan" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_accountmanagementclientplanid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_accountmanagementactionplan">
    <attribute name="leidos_accountmanagementactionplanid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentaccountmanagementclientplan" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_accountmanagementclientplanid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_clientplanreviewresponse">
    <attribute name="leidos_clientplanreviewresponseid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentclientplan" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_accountmanagementclientplanid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_keystrategicaction">
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_keystrategicactionid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentaccountmanagementactionplan" operator="eq" value="@{items('Loop_through_AMAPs_-_Status_to_Inactive')?['leidos_accountmanagementactionplanid']}"/>
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_clientactionplan">
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_parentaccount" />
    <attribute name="leidos_clientactionplanid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentaccountmanagementactionplan" operator="eq"  value="@{items('Loop_through_AMAPs_-_Status_to_Inactive')?['leidos_accountmanagementactionplanid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>
